title: 384 Build-templates files can not generated due to build procedure changed

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

384

### System information

All

### Issue description

1. First time build web-mobile, plugin will generate application.ejs, index.ejs under the folder build-templates, after build completion, nothing under the build-templates folder.
2. Second time build web-mobile, after build completion, there are appliction.js and index.js under the folder build-templates.

用户第一次建構時 (build-templates 是空的狀態下)
預計用插件來放入 build-templates 的 ejs 文件並沒有被建構到

第二次建構時, 因為第一次的關係
此時 build-templates 殘留著先前的 ejs 文件
這時建構後的 build 目錄才是我們自訂的 js 文件

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

1. First time build web-mobile, plugin will generate application.ejs, index.ejs under the folder build-templates, after build completion, nothing under the build-templates folder.
2. Second time build web-mobile, after build completion, there are appliction.js and index.js under the folder build-templates.

### Minimal reproduction project

_No response_

title: Support for spine with shared image

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

Currently, I've noticed cases that I have multiple spine files, but they all share the same .atlas files (images included)


I have been trying to find where I could contribute with that feature, since it is basically supplying a different atlas text path, but I didn't find anywhere I could hook up the editor importer.

### Problem Description

The problem is that currently, when cocos detects a spine json file, it attempts to load ${fileName}.atlas and its associated images.

### Proposed Solution

The editor can provide in the Inspector, a space for an alternative path for an atlas file, which is loaded at both editor and runtime when assigning that skeleton data

### How it works

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ca6f14ea-a757-4e3a-86c4-24f44f49f9a5)
Provide a property with an alternate atlas load path

### Alternatives Considered

I have tried building a SkeletonData by using a TextAsset and a JsonAsset. The problem is that technique doesn't load the images defined inside the TextAsset and thus, it doesn't render anything

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: [spine相关] SkeletonData 存在额外的内存浪费.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.3

### System information

all

### Issue description

SkeletonData 类的 getRuntimeData() 方法中, 会通过  
spine.wasmUtil.querySpineSkeletonDataByUUID(uuid); 来获取 spine 的 数据.
但是 该方法是从 wasm端获取, 不知道是因为没有使用共享内存还是其他原因,   每次通过 同样的 uuid 获得的 对象 都是不一样的对象. 伪代码: 
```ts
const dataA = spine.wasmUtil.querySpineSkeletonDataByUUID(12345);
const dataB = spine.wasmUtil.querySpineSkeletonDataByUUID(12345);

console.log(dataA === dataB) ; // 打印 false
```

这就导致, 同一个 spine动画的不同实例, 明明用的是同一个  Skeleton Data ,但是每个实例都自己保存一份 数据.

如果 这个spine动画 有大批量实例(比如 成群的某一种怪兽 士兵 动植物等等.) 对内存会有额外的浪费. 

希望能优化.





### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

如上所述

### Minimal reproduction project

_No response_

### Issue description

该方法的签名为
 public readPixels (x?: number, y?: number, width?: number, height?: number, buffer?: Uint8Array): Uint8Array | null
[https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/blob/d7aae745748dd132281b93c86d0bb0d778c8a9ad/cocos/asset/assets/render-texture.ts#L227](url)

如果这样写：

```
const buffer = new Uint8Array(4)

```
那么在浏览器环境下，buffer可以获取到像素值，但是在原生（ios、android）环境下，buffer的值不变。

title: Label text wrapping do not respect non-breaking spaces

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.3

### System information

Web

### Issue description

Expected:

An non-breaking space in a string should never be broken when displaying the text.

Actual:

If a text with an non-breaking space is displayed in a label that has an overflow processing, the wrapping will break the unbreakable space if it encounters it.

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

- Have a label with an overflow processing enabled.
- In a component's script, set the string of the label with a non-breaking space in it
- Tweak the width of the label so that the non-breaking space is positioned where the text should wrap
- See that the the non-breaking space is ignored and treated like a normal space that can be broken.

### Minimal reproduction project

[NewProject.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17013416/NewProject.zip)

title: IOS Game Overheating Issue

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.3

### System information

iOS

### Issue description

We are experiencing significant performance issues on iOS devices, with poor FPS and high battery consumption. Upon profiling, we discovered the following:
• The frameMove function consumes about 25% to 50% of the total execution time.
• Handling of touch events accounts for significant execution time.
We are curious to know if any performance improvements have been made since then, particularly for iOS builds
![9d28bec0ffc15dff52c8260edf7caa36a054ff8a_2_1034x396](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/43a547a3-0764-4232-a642-dda543ab73eb)
These issues are likely from iOS’s restriction on Just-In-Time (JIT) compilation, leading to slower JavaScript execution compared to platforms that allow JIT (such as Android).
Also curious to know how much of a performance difference can be expected with JIT enabled versus without it
![eb529a220c4fb79ffe866bafefbdfd85753bed49_2_1034x558](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8d9f4ff5-2896-4e11-be1d-40c68d66c8b2)


### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

Using cocos creator 3.8.3 in our 2D game where the battery consumption in iOS is too high due to high CPU usage even when the game is idle. We are not using any physics as well.
We have checked disabling metal validation and in release mode but not much difference in them.

title: 无论 node.active 是否为 true , invalidateChildren 总是会被执行, 导致性能出现问题.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.3

### System information

all

### Issue description

无论 node.active 是否为 true , node.invalidateChildren() 总是会被执行, 导致性能出现问题.

node.acitve 或者 _activeInHierarchy = false 时, 
对node 进行一些处理时, 还是会 调用 invalidateChildren , 而 invalidateChildren 是深度全遍历的.
我的实际场景中,  有 20000 (2万) 多个节点,  但是其中大多是 是 active 或者 _activeInHierarchy = false的.
然后 对他们的 父节点 进行某些操作时,   invalidateChildren 还是会对 那些隐藏的节点进行处理. 从而影响性能

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

如上所述.

### Issue description

问题描述：使用一个AudioSource一直循环play一个音效 loop为false 发现内部有一个事件数组的长度一直在加 没有清。
代码实现：
```
              this.schedule(() => {
			this.audioSourceCom.loop = false
			this.audioSourceCom.play()
		},1)
```

使用play方法播放音效的时候会进入这里 在这个AudioSource上注册一个一次性事件
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b72b7190-f657-47e6-bc40-c5bab6e0577d)
播放完毕后会进入这里 按照道理说注册的一次性事件，这里触发后会移除这个事件 可是数组的长度还是没有变（callbacks-invoker里面的把事件置空了 但是数组没有删）

title: Show loading progress for multiple resources

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

At the start of the game I have a loading screen that loads resources. It has a progress bar which shows loading progress. I am trying to load multiple bundles based on the individual player.

### Problem Description

The problem is that I am trying to load multiple bundles at the same time, but they all have their individual onProgress and onComplete callbacks.

I have not found any api documentation or source code that would allow for multiple bundles to be downloaded at the same time with one onProgress callback.

### Proposed Solution

Allow downloading resources at the same time:
```ts
public loadBundles (namesOrUrls: string[], (current: number, total: number) => unknown, (error: Error | null, bundles: Bundle[]) => {}): void;
```

My use-case is only for bundles, but obviously any resource would be nice.

Alternatively make loading methods return some class like `LoadingTask` which you can access to get desired information:
```ts
const loadingTask1 = assetManager.loadBundle(...);
const loadingTask2 = assetManager.loadAsset(...);

loadingTask1.current // number
loadingTask1.total // number
loadingTask1.onProgress = (current, total) => label.string = `${current/total}%`;

const mergedLoadingTask = LoadingTask.combine(loadingTask1, loadingTask2);
mergedLoadingTask.onProgress = (current, total) => label.string = `${current/total}%`;
```

### Alternatives Considered

I tried some hacky ways to sum the loaded resources from all bundles and divide it by the total bundle sizes, but it was questionable solution. I even sometimes saw the progress bar going backwards for a second for the reason unknown to me.

title: 聊一聊为什么最近我提了很多关于spine的'冷门'问题, 以及对cocos的spine的一些期望.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

聊一聊为什么最近我提了很多关于spine的'冷门'问题, 以及对cocos的spine的一些期望.

我最近突然提了很多关于 spine的issue, 估计cocos的工程师都被我搞烦了.
别人用着挺好的 为啥到我这就这么多逼事.

我来展开说一说背后的原因吧.

--------

我最近在帮甲方做一个游戏项目的移植工作. 将他们c++写的自研引擎的项目 用cocos creator 重写.
以便登录国内各种小游戏平台.

甲方是一家有多年研发经验的国外公司, 除了手游, 还做过 3ds ns ps 等主机游戏.
所以我觉得可以排除他们 "不会用spine" 的这种情况.
 
相反, 他们对spine的使用非常的深入 和 高级. 我也学到了一些东西.
但是有一些场景 我在 cocos里难以实现. 很多时候 api也有, 但是执行就出错. 
目前我怀疑是 js空间和 wasm空间之间 内存共享和传址一类的错误. 最常见的是 
"memory access out of bounds" 和 "null function or function signature mismatch".

我举几个例子.

-------


### 场景1:  克隆 Skin
运行时动态创建皮肤, 动态修改皮肤.
美术设计师, 只要做一套皮肤的 spine动画就可以, 比如名字叫作 level_1, 代表某角色 1级时的样子.

当角色升级时,  程序端 clone skine level_1 , 并重命名为 level_2, 同时修改皮肤中的某些元素,
再添加到 骨骼动画上.
 伪代码如下:
```
  const skinA = skeleton.findSkin(skinNameA);
  const skinB = new Skine()
  skinB.copySkin(skinA);
  // 对 skinB 进行一些修改, 然后设置
  skeleton.setSkin(skinB);

```

### 场景2: 移除 Attachment
我之前的帖子里提到过, 为什么要移除 Attachment .
因为 spine不支持动态的 隐藏 slot 的功能. 要隐藏slot , 需要隐藏slot下的 Attachment.

所以会用到 类似 `slot.removeAttachment()`一类的api.
但是 spine的设计是, 如果移除了, 就真的移除了, 没法还原.
所以甲方的做法是.
先备份 Attachment . 然后需要隐藏时调用 removeAttachment(),  需要显示时再 setAttachment() 给设置回去.
执行 setAttachment(attaObj)  时, 传入的是一个对象, 而不是 一个名字, 因为这个名字的附件之前已经被移除了,不存在了.

### 场景3: Skin 和 Slot 的 备份与还原

类似前面对 Attachment 处理. 就是 获得原始的 skin slot 对象, 备份起来.
然后程序根据游戏运行时的状态, 各种修改这些对象.
每次修改 都是基于备份的原始对象来的.
并且在某些时刻要还原成原始状态.

我试图通过备份 spine.SkeletonData 来实现类似的功能, 但是失败了. 也是 各种"memory access out of bounds"
(见 https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/issues/17436#issuecomment-2255078544 )

--------

他们这么做算不上奇技淫巧, 是很正常的程序化的思路.
大幅降低了动画设计师的工作量和spine动画本身的体积.
而且有些内容动画设计师也难以提前做好, 因为一个东西的样子 可能由运行时决定.

总之, 他们对"动态修改spine的各种对象" 的需求很多, 已经不仅仅是简单的"换装"了.

---------

因为 cocos的spine组件 本身包含了 原始的 spine的runtime对象, 理论上, 甲方用到的这些功能 都能实现.
实际上我也确实找到了很多能一一对应的api.
但是 实际使用起来 要么没有效果, 要么报很多难以理解的错误(主要是wasm相关的).

不知道这个问题是否有解, 理论上应该能吧.
wasm和js互相同步和操作对象的事情 其他的引擎也有做, 没有遇到类似的问题.
(比如我一致关注的 https://github.com/jrouwe/JoltPhysics.js 这个项目的wasm版本可以很好的处理 wasm和js之间的数据传输和同步).

如果真的确实无解的话. 希望cocos能提供一个 让开发者"不使用wasm版本的spine ,只用ts版本spine"的开关.
这样很多问题我们开发者自己就能想办法解决了.

当然最好还是希望那些 spine wasm的api都能正常跑起来.


.



### Problem Description

.

### Proposed Solution

_No response_

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

.

### Additional Information

_No response_

[void Skeleton::setSkin(Skin *newSkin) {](https://github.com/EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes/blob/09c71cd3133fd1dfaff6feb34528e609e2f4ff75/spine-cpp/spine-cpp/src/spine/Skeleton.cpp#L334) 截图如下: 应用场景主要有两个: 1) 程序动态创建 skin , 2) 跨动画文件(不同的spine组件) 互相传递 skin. 这两个需求不是我自己yy出来的, 实际项目中有用到. ``` const skeletonData = anim.skeletonData.getRuntimeData(); const skin = skeletonData.findSkin(skinName); const newSkin = new sp.spine.Skin(newSkinName); newSkin.copySkin(skin); // do something: 对 newSkin 进行若干修改. anim.setSkin(newSkin) ; // 此处将新skin对象设置给anim, 但是 cocos的runtime不支持. ``` ( 最近在和某游戏公司合作, 我发现他们对 spine 的使用真的很深 各种复杂用法. 我之前提的关于 Attachment 的 也是源自他们的项目. 不过他们不是cocos项目, 用的是spine官方的runtime ) ### Problem Description . ### Proposed Solution _No response_ ### How it works _No response_ ### Alternatives Considered . ### Additional Information _No response_

title: [Feature Request] The game needs to adapt to the device high refresh rate

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

Current mainstream mobile devices support setting screen refresh rates higher than 60 HZ, but currently, the CocosCreator engine sets the game frame rate at a fixed 60 FPS and does not automatically adapt to the device's high refresh rate mode to adjust the game frame rate.

目前的主流移动设备都支持设置高于 60 HZ 的屏幕刷新率，但是目前 CocosCreator 引擎设置的游戏帧率是固定的 60 FPS，不会自动适应设备的高刷新率模式调整游戏帧率。

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e9e0aebe-9735-4f76-bd3c-cd3f07a67d9c)


### Problem Description

Since the animation effects and behaviors such as node displacement and rotation in the game may be created using a fixed FPS (such as 60 FPS), if the user sets the screen refresh rate to 120 HZ on their device, when they return to the game, the game's frame rate will not automatically change to 120 FPS (issues: it might be 60 FPS or 65 FPS), and it will not automatically adjust the animation frame rate in the game. This will cause animations with lower frame rates to appear choppy in high refresh rate modes.

We hope that the game's maximum frame rate can automatically adapt to the device's maximum refresh rate, and that there can be relevant events triggered, allowing the game to automatically modify the frame rate of animations or physics systems.

因为游戏中的动画效果以及节点位移、旋转等行为可能都是使用固定的 FPS 制作的（比如 60 FPS）,如果用户在设备中设置为 120 HZ 屏幕刷新率，那么回到游戏中时，游戏的帧率无法自动变成 120 FPS（[issues: 可能会是 60 FPS 或 65 FPS](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/issues/17353)），并且不会自动修改游戏中的动画帧率，这就会导致低帧率的动画在高刷新率模式下显得卡顿。

我们期望能够让游戏最高帧率能够自动适应设备的最高刷新率，并且能有相关的事件传递出来，让游戏可以自动修改动画或者物理系统的帧率。

### Proposed Solution

_No response_

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

--

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: Use Bullet system ConfigurableConstraint Component, angularDriverSettings.targetOrientation setting will be a fixed orientation.
body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.x

### System information

CocosEditor, Browser

### Issue description

Use Bullet system ConfigurableConstraint Component, when angularDriverSettings.targetOrientation setting, the object will be a fixed orientation.

### Relevant error log output

none

### Steps to reproduce

1.Use Bullet system ConfigurableConstraint Component
2.Set angularDriverSettings.targetOrientation z Axis，normally , z is positive the car wheel will turn left，z is negative the car wheel will turn right,  but during testing, no matter z is positive or negative, the car wheel is turn one side. After logging in the code, the code call bt.Generic6DofSpring2Constraint_setTargetVelocity function to adjust the wheel orientation。
3.Change physic system from bullet to physX, the car can turn left and right while setting angularDriverSettings.targetOrientation z value。

1.使用bullet物理系统 configurableConstraint
2.设置angularDriverSettings.targetOrientation，主要是z，理论上z为正轮子向左，z为负轮子向右, 但是测试结果物理z是正数或者负数都是向一边。打印log跟踪bullet系统最终调用Generic6DofSpring2Constraint_setTargetVelocity来设置转向数值。
3.把物理系统从bullet改为physX则能根据z正负数来向左和向右。

title: 关于cocos源码的 tsconfig 改造, 可以先一步一步来. 第一步: 关闭 "strictPropertyInitialization"

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body: ### Use Case 关于cocos源码的 tsconfig 和 eslint 的问题, 我在很多渠道发表过观点了. 我也知道 这种改动如果要一步到位 一蹴而就 很难 . 但是可以分部进行. 先找可以平滑过渡的. 建议第一步可以先将 tsconfig 中的 "strictPropertyInitialization" 设置为 false. -------- 当开启 "strict": true 时, ts默认也会把 strictPropertyInitialization 设置为 true, 其实这是非常不合理的. 说明如下: ``` // 如果 "strictPropertyInitialization" 为 true , 会面临下面的问题: class KlassFoo { // do sth. } class KlassA { // 必须实例化一个 KlassFoo, 显然是不科学的. foo 有可能需要延迟创建. foo: KlassFoo = new KlassFoo(); } class KlassB { // 需要被迫增加一个 undefined , 破坏了 foo 的原本的意义, // 且代码变得冗繁, 到最后项目里会有非常多的 `| undefined` foo: KlassFoo | undefined; } class KlassC { // 被迫加一个 ! , 来欺骗编译器, 这么做是非常危险的 foo: KlassFoo = null! } /* 按照 strictPropertyInitialization 的设计, 其实只有 KlassA 是正道. 后面的两种方案都是为了屏蔽编译器报错 而采取的 "欺骗手段" 但是在实际项目里, KlassA 的做法显然也是不可取的. 成员变量(属性)的类型声明, 本身就是为了声明类型, 而不是创建这个成员变量. ts里 strictPropertyInitialization=true 的设计, 强迫把声明过程 和 实例化过程混在一起, 是一个 并不好的设计. */ ``` 实际上, 从cocos的源码也能看出来, strictPropertyInitialization = true 时, 给开发人员带来了巨大的麻烦. 因为实际上 99%类是不需要`在 声明成员变量时 直接初始化`的, 所以cocos里大量的. ``` class KlassA { foo: KlassFoo = null! } ``` `strictPropertyInitialization` 这个绝对是 反模式(至少是反oop模式) 的设计, 事实证明也确实给 cocos的开发人员带来了困扰. 所以 改造的第一步就是: 1. 在tsconfig里 将 strictPropertyInitialization 设置为 false 2. 在这之后, 就可以清理掉那些 为了 "欺骗编译器" 而给成员属性增加的 `null! , undefined! , | undefined` 一类的代码了. 以上两步 不会破坏任何已有的逻辑, 只会让代码变得更干净. --------- cocos 越来越复杂 , 开发人员和网上愿意提交pr的人也越来越多, 大家的编码水平和编码习惯也有所差异, 越是如此 越需要一套科学合理的 tsconfig 以及 eslint (还有个叫 [ESLint Stylistic](https://eslint.style/) 的 建议关注下) 来约束代码. 希望官方可以考虑下. 这个事情其实远比你们想象的要重要, 因为目前这种不合理的tsconfig和eslint 已经影响到cocos的开发了 . cocos官方开发人员为了 绕开这些不合理的 tsconfig和eslint , 自己写了很多hack代码 , 不断的用一个个错误的编程方式来弥补错误的tsconfig和eslint 造成的影响. 甚至有人在自己的开发机上暗改 tsconfig、eslint， 偷偷的关闭了 ts的严格模式。 到最后 tsconfig和eslint 只是用来限制社区提交PR的效率和热情 ，对你们内部正面价值甚微。 我们可以站在那些选择"用一个错误弥补另一个错误, 将错就错 错上加错"的开发人员的角度去思考下, 他们为什么这么做. 现在在堆积如山的todo list面前， 奋战在第一线的开发者肯定无暇顾忌太多，快点完成任务才是王道。 所以他为什么暗改tsconfig, 为什么关闭严格模式, 为什么无脑添加 null! ? 是不是因为不如果不这样做 影响他的开发效率和进度？如果是这样，那么是不是可以证明现在的 tsconfig 和 eslint 存在问题？ 磨刀不误砍柴工的道理大家都懂， 但是什么时候磨刀 磨多久，每个人的看法不同，每个团队每个项目的标准肯定也不同, 这玩意也没有最佳实践 标准答案. 最后如何去做 , 肯定还是要你们团队自己去考虑. 我只是想善意的提醒一下: 3.8.5之后 该考虑磨磨刀了. ### Problem Description 如上所述 ### Proposed Solution _No response_ ### How it works _No response_ ### Alternatives Considered 无 ### Additional Information _No response_

title: 鼠标点击事件的 event id 错误

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.3

### System information

all

### Issue description

有两个bug: 
1. 两个鼠标按键同时按下时, 两者的 id 都是 0 

2.  每次点击时, 鼠标的 id 都是 0 . 这个设计和 touch一类的设计不一样, 这样不太好, 不便于跟踪鼠标按下的到抬起的生命周期. 建议每次点击重新生成(累加即可) .

用户完成一次对鼠标按键的完整操作( 按下, 移动 ,抬起),    那么这次鼠标按键的"使命"就已经完成了.
下次用户再对鼠标按键进行操作时, 即使按的还是同一个按键,  对于触控系统而言其实是"另一个人来执行这个使命" 了.
(如果要跟踪鼠标左键还是右键 应该用其他的标识, 而非id) 

触控设备 原生的 touche 事件就是这样设计的.  每次touch 都是一个新的id. 
如果cocos的鼠标事件也能按原生逻辑设计, 第1个bug 应该也能解决.


### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

如上所述

_No response_

body:
### Use Case

`device.copyTextureToTexture`

### Problem Description

Currently，we only support copy buffers to texture or copy texture to buffer.
If we want copy texture to texture, we need to use custom pipeline and register the atlas, which is a bit cumbersome.

We need copy texture to texture in gfx.

_No response_

_No response_

Use custom pipeline.

title: Tilemap tiles has wrong display

### Cocos Creator version

Windows 10

### Issue description

If you are using Tilemap where multiple tiles is packed into a single image, the tiles has wrong display at the edges (looks like it crops 0.5px of the tile texture on each side) and tiles don't look seamless too

![image](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/44067398/044f88b7-4cfe-49ec-9f3d-2bd16d1a4275)

I blame these lines of code because if you are using multiple images for each tile or just one tile in the tileset - the tile has 
the right display

Just any tilemap with all tiles packed on one single sprite

title: 希望引擎中能包含 uuid 压缩和解压缩的方法.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

实际项目中 需要 将标准 uuid 转换成 压缩的uuid, 但是发现 3.x 里并暴露没有相关方法 (源码中也没有) 
而是调用的 编辑器的相关代码. 编辑器又不开源.

具体使用场景有点特殊, 我是要扫描prefab 对里面引用的资源做一些处理, 但是引用资源的uuid 都是完整版的, 但是编译后的项目使用的又是压缩版本的.

且引擎提供的各种 uuid相关的方法的示例里使用的都是 压缩格式的.  开发者其实挺难通过脚本批量进行 uuid的压缩和解压.

总不能在编辑器里一个个的资源点击右键查看 然后自己记录.

希望官方能提供下相关方法. 哪怕不暴露

### Problem Description

如上

title: 点击事件不回调end或cancel，点击数量获取不对

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.2

### System information

android

### Issue description

在界面上多点触控，如果一瞬间加载卡顿，同时在界面上滑动多次手指，则概率会出现touch事件不调用end的情况。
查找源码发现android_native_app_glue.c中的onTouchEvent中缓存点击事件，如果超过NATIVE_APP_GLUE_MAX_NUM_MOTION_EVENTS则不缓存点击事件了，猜想应该是此处引起的，把end事件丢弃了，暂时也想不到更好的办法解决

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

在界面上多点触控，如果一瞬间加载卡顿，同时在界面上滑动多次手指，则概率会出现touch事件不调用end的情况

### Minimal reproduction project

_No response_

title: Texture nearest filter breaks batching

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.3

### System information

Windows 11 Pro

### Issue description

Noticed that if **Label** parent (**Button**, **Sprite**) texture filter is set to _nearest_ leads to breaking batching with increased number of drawcalls (depends on how many nodes you have). But drawcalls stays at 2 if texture filter is set to _bilinear_

### Relevant error log output

n/a

### Steps to reproduce

you can use any project and run scene:
1. add button to scene
2. switch label cache mode to bitmap (for reducing drawcalls)
3. run scene
4. check drawcall number (stays at 2)

to reproduce
1. check button in inspector
2. assign texture with filter is set to nearest
3. run scene
4. check drawcall number (increased to 3 and depends how many buttons you have)

### Minimal reproduction project

[NewProject.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/15986229/NewProject.zip)

title: When reporting "cannot import from directory", the relevant script path is not printed directly.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.2

### System information

MacOS

### Issue description

RT.

For all script system errors, especially import errors, can the relevant script path be returned? Otherwise, it is very difficult to find the script where the error occurred, especially if the editor code is not open source and there is no way to break the point.

eg:

has-error.ts:
```ts
import { a } from ".. /extensions/xxx/dir";
```

error:
```ts
xxx error, file: assets/has-error.ts
```

If the script does not have a real path, you should return to the path of the temporary product in the library or print the script content directly, so that you can better find the original path.

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

.

### Minimal reproduction project

_No response_

title: 希望 cc.Sprite 组件使用系统自带材质时, 可以方便的设置 srcBlendFactor 和 dstBlendFactor

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

对于2D游戏, 调整整两个参数还是很常见的需求. 比如处理预乘图片和非预乘图片时.
我能理解 "从sprite组件上删除blend相关属性, 将它们放到材质里去设置"的做法, 但是希望在sprite使用系统自带材质时, 也可以方便的调节blend相关属性.
现在如果要调整 还要复制一个系统材质 然后用自定义材质的方式 添加到sprite上 很麻烦.
而且我看 prefab 的代码,   
```
    "_srcBlendFactor": 2,
    "_dstBlendFactor": 4,
```

title: [Security Risk] Support for customerized implementation to replacing resources.load's network call.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

This issue is related to official document:
https://docs.cocos.com/creator/3.8/manual/zh/asset/cache-manager.html#%E4%B8%8A%E4%BC%A0%E8%B5%84%E6%BA%90%E5%88%B0%E8%BF%9C%E7%A8%8B%E6%9C%8D%E5%8A%A1%E5%99%A8
Packaging for mini game, like wx. we usually need to put dynamic resources like atlas, png and mp3 stored in remote file server like OSS/COS. Those resources are mainly added through creator editor, or programtically loaded by the developers using assetManager.


### Problem Description

For performance issue,  game without a dedicated server (like ECS) usually needs to choose a OSS/COS server to store the  `remote ` folder. But this is a very dangerous action, Since OSS/COS needs to be set as `public read`. 
Current solution may lead to a huge money lost when facing a DoS attack.

### Proposed Solution

For now, including WX, lots of mini game platforms support cloud hosted file server.
In which, remote resouces are not read through public network, but from the platform app through the platform's private network.
For example of WX, document is in : 
https://developers.weixin.qq.com/miniprogram/dev/wxcloudrun/src/guide/storage/
This is a safe and friendly solution and natually immune of DoS.

This is not the same thing as public cloud object storage like OSS/COS. But there is no direct support from Cocos package.
The fact is, to use this feature,  needs the engine low level network `GET` request replaced by the platform cloud access API, take WX for example: 
```
wx.cloud.downloadFile({
  fileID: 'cloud://werun-id/test/test.png',
  success: console.log,
  fail: console.error
})
```
And assetManager  should consider expose an interface to let API caller cutomerize the low level default network API. in other words, let API caller customerize their own way of network access.

### How it works

This could be implemented by providing the assetManager.load() related API an alternative implementation of using user's customerized implemntation rather then using a direct default HTTP fetch call.
Or engine provides platform independent implementations and user can choose.

### Alternatives Considered

It would be possible to do it if pipeline is more friendly and take effects, but for now pipeline and assetManager.downloader seems not fully support this when consider downloading editor added resources. 
(
Feel free to close this feature request if the pipeline and assetManager.downloader can do this for downloading editor equiped resources. And please post some examples whould be very helpful
)

### Additional Information

This is a huge security risk and many people does not fully aware of, especially user without a dedicated Resources server, we are exposed to a security risk caused by the architecture.

### Cocos Creator version

2.4.11

### System information

Window 10 Cocos Creator Editor

### Issue description

I'm making a 2D HTML canvas web game in Cocos. I want to add a banner ad at the top on every screen. Now, the project is old and is very complex and I can't modify every scene for this change. I tried changing the canvas element's CSS properties in the generated build's index.html but there is a problem.

When the game loads, I can see the offset area at the top. But as soon as I click on the game, it fills the whole screen again. I don't want that. Please see the gif for reference:

![Animation](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/114640289/65136082-8bd5-48b0-9f2a-046cc0f62fa9)

I have disabled fullscreen at the start using `cc.view.enableAutoFullScreen(false);`. I don't think it's a fullscreen issue.

I have added the following CSS properties in the canvas tag's style:
```
top:50px;margin-top:0;position:relative
```
Can anyone please help me? Apparently the same issue is happening in the latest versions like v3.8.2 as well.

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

1. Create a Web Mobile platform build
2. Modify the index.html and add the style properties `top:50px;marginTop:0;position:relative` to the canvas tag
3. Load the game in the browser. Observe that on game load, the offset is present.
4. Click anywhere on the game. Observe that the offset disappears and game is rendering the whole screen.

labels.name: Needs Triage

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.3

### System information

Windows 11 - Windows SDK 10.0.19041.0 or above

### Issue description

When compiling the addon for editor (EngineAddon) on Windows, the macro `OPAQUE` of `wingdi.h` overrides all the `OPAQUE` values of `cocos/scene/raytracing/Description.h`. This causes building errors.

Adding the follow "undef" macro will make compilation successful:
```code
#ifdef OPAQUE
#undef OPAQUE
#endif
```

This still works for Windows SDK 10.0.19041.0.
But, using SDK 10.0.22621.0 to build engine will cause the editor failed to start up.

title: Intersection detection for Physics

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

[Intersection2D](https://docs.cocos.com/creator/3.8/api/zh/class/Intersection2D)
[geometry.intersect](https://docs.cocos.com/creator/3.8/api/zh/namespace/geometry?id=intersect)

只有与形状进行相交检测的函数，缺少与 Collider 之间进行相交检测的函数。

一些理由：
- 建立一条射线之后，我想要只测试是否击中了某个 Collider，使用 `raycast` 之类的函数感觉可能性能太低。
- 当然，自己可以封装函数，但我觉得这个功能算是比较常用，也属于基础设施，应该内置于引擎。
- 由于需要通过判断 Collider 是哪种形状的碰撞器来实现这个功能，用户封装的代码会在引擎增加新的碰撞器、删除旧的碰撞器时过时。

API 设计：
- 可能是放在 `PhysicsSystem` 里与当前 intersect 类中所有方法相等的一系列方法。
- 或者是在 Collider 增加一个 `geometry` 属性，或者一个 `toGeometry(collider)` 工具方法。

### Problem Description

.

### Proposed Solution

_No response_

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

title: Add an API for modify PHYSICS_2D_PTM_RATIO
[feature] Reusable for internal actions in Tween and reusable for Tween

labels.name: P3
labels.description: Low priority

body:
Currently, every time we create a tween, all the actions are allocated from scratch which are not added to Pool. So they're all GC objects which may cause GC stress.

Also, tween instances could not be put into a pool since there is not a `reset` or `killAll` method in Tween.

title: Support Tween.from and Tween.fromTo
问题：ScrollView 滚动事件回调接收到的是数字，然而EventType里没有数字的，只有字符串的。
body:
下面是查到的出问题的原代码：
```
// ScrollView
protected _dispatchEvent (event: string) {
        if (event === EventType.SCROLL_ENDED) {
            this._scrollEventEmitMask = 0;
        } else if (event === EventType.SCROLL_TO_TOP
            || event === EventType.SCROLL_TO_BOTTOM
            || event === EventType.SCROLL_TO_LEFT
            || event === EventType.SCROLL_TO_RIGHT) {
            const flag = (1 << eventMap[event]);
            if (this._scrollEventEmitMask & flag) {
                return;
            } else {
                this._scrollEventEmitMask |= flag;
            }
        }

        ComponentEventHandler.emitEvents(this.scrollEvents, this, eventMap[event]);
        this.node.emit(event, this);
    }
```
// 发送的 eventMap[event] 是数字
```
const eventMap = {
    'scroll-to-top': 0,
    'scroll-to-bottom': 1,
    'scroll-to-left': 2,
    'scroll-to-right': 3,
    scrolling: 4,
    'bounce-bottom': 6,
    'bounce-left': 7,
    'bounce-right': 8,
    'bounce-top': 5,
    'scroll-ended': 9,
    'touch-up': 10,
    'scroll-ended-with-threshold': 11,
    'scroll-began': 12,
};
```
// cc.d.ts 里 ScrollView 对应的 EventType enum 都是字符串的，没有数字的，所以匹配不上。
```
export enum _cocos_ui_scroll_view__EventType {
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView scroll to the top boundary of inner container.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动到顶部边界事件。
     */
    SCROLL_TO_TOP = "scroll-to-top",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView scroll to the bottom boundary of inner container.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动到底部边界事件。
     */
    SCROLL_TO_BOTTOM = "scroll-to-bottom",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView scroll to the left boundary of inner container.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动到左边界事件。
     */
    SCROLL_TO_LEFT = "scroll-to-left",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView scroll to the right boundary of inner container.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动到右边界事件。
     */
    SCROLL_TO_RIGHT = "scroll-to-right",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView scroll began.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动开始时发出的事件。
     */
    SCROLL_BEGAN = "scroll-began",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView auto scroll ended.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动结束的时候发出的事件。
     */
    SCROLL_ENDED = "scroll-ended",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView scroll to the top boundary of inner container and start bounce.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动到顶部边界并且开始回弹时发出的事件。
     */
    BOUNCE_TOP = "bounce-top",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView scroll to the bottom boundary of inner container and start bounce.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动到底部边界并且开始回弹时发出的事件。
     */
    BOUNCE_BOTTOM = "bounce-bottom",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView scroll to the left boundary of inner container and start bounce.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动到左边界并且开始回弹时发出的事件。
     */
    BOUNCE_LEFT = "bounce-left",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView scroll to the right boundary of inner container and start bounce.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图滚动到右边界并且开始回弹时发出的事件。
     */
    BOUNCE_RIGHT = "bounce-right",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView is scrolling.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图正在滚动时发出的事件。
     */
    SCROLLING = "scrolling",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when ScrollView auto scroll ended with a threshold.
     *
     * @zh
     * 滚动视图自动滚动快要结束的时候发出的事件。
     */
    SCROLL_ENG_WITH_THRESHOLD = "scroll-ended-with-threshold",
    /**
     * @en
     * The event emitted when user release the touch.
     *
     * @zh
     * 当用户松手的时候会发出一个事件。
     */
    TOUCH_UP = "touch-up"
}

```

### Cocos Creator version

all support physx platform

### Issue description

physx引擎制作的动态刚体，凡是涉及到使用mesh碰撞体生成的，都无法正常缩放，仅有球，立方，胶囊提三种基础碰撞体正常。（圆柱等cocos自带的，内部也是mesh的实现方式）

目前还没有测试完整的benchmark，仅从web上看，个人项目可以接受。

_No response_

空白项目，新建一个圆柱型动态刚体，然后把物理引擎切换为physx，代码里面tween写一个最简单的节点缩放即可。
播放后会看到，仅有子节点的渲染mesh会动，实际刚体无变化。
相同的方式，球形或者胶囊没问题，可以正常缩放，拥有缩放过程的物理表现。

title: wrong behavior with propagationImmediateStopped

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.2

### System information

MacOS

### Issue description

For the sake of accuracy of expression, I will use Chinese next(without google translate).

实际行为：
`node-event-processor.ts`
```ts
// Event.AT_TARGET
// checks if destroyed in capturing callbacks
event.eventPhase = 2;
event.currentTarget = owner;
if (this.capturingTarget) {
    this.capturingTarget.emit(event.type, event);
}
if (!event.propagationImmediateStopped && this.bubblingTarget) {
    this.bubblingTarget.emit(event.type, event);
}
```
在捕获与冒泡阶段，`propagationImmediateStopped` 没有任何作用，仅用于阻止不向目标阶段的冒泡监听的事件，甚至在目标阶段的监听事件途中设置的话，也不影响剩余的 `callbacks`。

文档描述：
> propagationImmediateStopped: 立即停止当前事件的传递，事件甚至不会被分派到所连接的当前目标。

问题：
现在文档与代码的行为是不一致的，那么，哪个行为是正确的？

然后，事件系统的行为是否应该实现得与 W3C 规范一致？
https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#stop-immediate-propagation-flag

顺便说句，现在的代码实现太古怪了，propagationImmediateStopped 的作用仅仅是跳过 `AT_TARGET` 目标阶段，后续依然会进行冒泡。

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

.

### Minimal reproduction project

_No response_

title: 关于 cocos编译后的微信小游戏的 window未定义 的错误.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.3

### System information

android

### Issue description

3.8.3版本编译后的 微信小游戏 game.js 代码最后部分如下: 
```
// NOTE: on WeChat Android end, we can only get the correct screen size at the second tick of game.
var sysInfo = wx.getSystemInfoSync();
if (sysInfo.platform.toLocaleLowerCase() === 'android') {
    GameGlobal.requestAnimationFrame (__initApp);
} else {
    __initApp();
}
```

在安卓下,  因为调用了`GameGlobal.requestAnimationFrame()`,  导致部分自定义的代码和逻辑无法正确执行.

比如下面的代码: 

![image](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/288367/53328a43-31b5-4f3c-8ff0-6f8dc7135eb9)

安卓下 游戏内无法执行 window['testFoo'] , 直接报错  `window is not defined`
![15221716973916_ pic](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/288367/414d9ee8-635f-4f08-baa9-530a5ecfb230)


可能是 GameGlobal.requestAnimationFrame 里做了什么手脚, 从上下文中干掉了 window.
经过测试,  改为  setTimeout() 也不行. 
直接调用 ` __initApp() ` 则没有任何问题.

------

如果找不到解决方案, 建议 非安卓平台也用  GameGlobal.requestAnimationFrame 来包装下.
确保所有平台一致, 而不要像现在这样, 安卓和其他平台完全不同.

当 iOS 平台也用  `GameGlobal.requestAnimationFrame(__initApp)` 后, 也会报类似错误.
![image](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/288367/2285a747-4f85-49dc-870f-3a8e73ff4ccf)

其实我是能接受都报错的, 大不了不去魔改 window , 但是我不太能接受 不同平台不一致的情况.

body:
### Use Case

- tab 窗口，必须有一个选中，用 ToggleContainer + Toggle 挺好
- 符合 html 中对于单选框的设定

### Problem Description

- 制作一个商城面板组件，通过 Tab 方式实现
- Tab： 服装、零食、运动、...
- 必须选中其中的一个 Tab

### Proposed Solution

_No response_

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

一、方案一
1. toggle 继承于 Button，click 事件先于 toggle 事件
2. 在 click 事件中置标志位
3. 在 toggle 判断已设置标志位，并且自身被绑定，则终止事件

二、方案二
1. 自定义 ToggleContainer 及 Toggle，分别继承自 core
2. 重载 ToggleContainer 的 `get toggleItems (): Toggle[]`
3. 重载 Toggle 的 `get _toggleContainer (): ToggleContainer | null`
4. 在组件中使用自定义的 ToggleContainer 及 Toggle

### Additional Information

- cocos/ui/toggle-container.ts
 - 允许未选中，当前状态
>     @type(CCBoolean)
>     @serializable
>     @tooltip('i18n:toggle_group.allowUnckecked')
>     public allowUnckecked = true

- cocos/ui/toggle.ts
>     protected _internalToggle (): void {
>         const parent = this._toggleContainer
> 
>         if (parent && parent.allowSwitchOff && !parent.allowUnckecked && this.isChecked) {
>             /**
>              * @en When a radio box must be selected, its own selection status cannot be cancelled
>              * @zh RadioBox 必须选中时，不能取消自身的选中状态
>              */
>             return
>         }
> 
>         this.isChecked = !this.isChecked;
>     }

- i18n
  - editor/i18n/{zh,en}/localization.js
    -  toggle_group 添加项 allowUnckecked

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.2

### System information

MacOS

### Issue description

- The current `jsb.onError` will capture all errors. It is recommended that the design be similar to Web and NodeJS, and onError should be divided into at least two different events: `onUnhandledRejection` and `onError`.
- `jsb` is now marked as a deprecated interface, but there is no replacement interface.
- Should be used as a platform layer for cross-platform abstraction, for example: `sys.getNetworkType()` api.

title: 关于 cc.AudioClip 和 cc.AudioSource 以及内部的 AudioPlayer 的设计问题.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.3

### System information

all

### Issue description

目前 cocos的设计是 在 cc.AudioClip 内创建时  , 其内部就创建了 一个 AudiPlayer 对象. 

这个 AudiPlayer 对象在不同平台 实现方式是不一样的.  在 web 对应的是 webaudio(或者 Audio dom) ,
在 微信小游戏平台 对应的是 一个 InnerAudioContext 对象. 

这个设计就产生了一个问题:  当开发者的本意只是 加载这些 音频资源 (暂时不播放) 时, 也会创建大量的 AudioPlayer.
我目前做的项目 一共 2000多个mp3文件.  虽然肯定不会同时播放.  但是为了游戏过程中的体验,  免不了要做异步懒加载/预加载.

这就导致 大量的 AudioPlayer 被创建 ,  于是收到了微信平台的警告: 
```
Warning(wx.createInnerAudioContext): Too many (200) InnerAudioContext instances have been created, 
    please destroy the existing instances first !
```

AudioClip  作为这一种资源(Asset),  最重要的是保存 资源文件的数据 (比如一个 buffer ),  通常无需创建独立的 AudioPlayer.
而且 cocos 的设计里,  AudioClip本身也不具备自己播放的能力.  通常都是要挂接到一个 cc.AudioSource 上.

所以 这个地方建议优化一下设计.  AudioClip 内部不要再包含 player了. 
当 clip 被赋值到  cc.AudioSource.clip 上时, 在AudioSource上创建就好, 而且我看代码, 现在 AudioSource 内部本来也是要创建的.

而且我和一些开发者交流下来, 其实大家 都会在实际项目中选择  用少量的  AudioSource 来播放大量的 clip.
所以 player 放到 AudioSource 里,  clip不再持有player 应该是一种更合理的设计.


 








### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

无

### Minimal reproduction project

_No response_

labels.name: Needs Triage

body:
### Use Case

记录在 .pac 中, 开发者就可以通过复制文件 来轻松的将一个 设置好策略的自动图集文件 复制到多个目录里.
(比如 游戏一共有100多个装有图片的目录, 其中有30多个要应用方案A的自动图集, 还有20个用方案B, 其他的不用自动图集) 

但是记录在meta里, 无法轻松实现这个需求. 
因为首先 要复制两个文件.pac 和 .pac的meta  , 其次meta中的uuid会冲突. 而且meta默认在编辑器里不可见, 理论上开发者也不应该直接操作meta (即使cocos会自动更正meta中的uuid, 直接操作meta也是不合理的) 

这个需求从2.x 就提过了 希望 3.x 能改进.

这个改进的兼容问题很好解决.  引擎可以尝试处理pac文件, 发现pac里没有核心数据后, 再尝试处理 meta. 
或者升级引擎后 统一将项目里的 .pac.meta里的信息移动到.pac里.

如上所述.

title: Image decompression may cause buffer overflow

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

all

### System information

native

### Issue description

The vulnerable Image::initWithJpgData function in file Image.cpp ([https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/blob/v3.8.4/native/cocos/platform/Image.cpp#L518](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/blob/v3.8.3/native/cocos/platform/Image.cpp#L518))
 is used to decompress jpegs and create a raw bitmap version of the image.



In Image::initWithJpgData, the values for cinfo.output_width and cinfo.output_height are retrieved directly from a jpeg file's header.



cinfo.output_width and cinfo.output_height can be manipulated by editing the header of the jpeg file being processed. They are two bytes each in the image's header so their values can
 range from 0x0000 to 0xFFFF. These variables are multiplied with cinfo.output_components.



When these three values are multiplied together they can exceed the limit of a 32-bit unsigned integer, leading to an integer overflow vulnerability. This product is used to set the
 size of the _data buffer, which will store the decompressed jpeg ([https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/blob/v3.8.4/native/cocos/platform/Image.cpp#L574](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/blob/v3.8.3/native/cocos/platform/Image.cpp#L574)).
 When the sizing arguments overflow, the buffer becomes too small to store the decompressed data.



The program writes the decompressed image to the buffer using the jpeg_read_scanlines function. The function ends up writing to out-of-bounds memory due to the buffer’s small size (https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/blob/v3.8.4/native/cocos/platform/Image.cpp#L582).
 This causes data in memory adjacent to the buffer to be overwritten.



An attacker is in control of the image's height, width, and contents. This allows an attacker to craft an exploit to overwrite data in memory with data they control.

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

No

### Minimal reproduction project

_No response_

title: [3.8.2] The prefab records data of model resources that are no longer in use

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body: ### Cocos Creator version 3.8.2 ### System information mac ### Issue description When modifying the MeshRenderer component's mesh in a prefab, if the mesh used is from a model resource that has the LOD (Level of Detail) feature enabled, the prefab will continuously reference this model resource. Even if the mesh is changed to use a different model resource, the prefab will still record the previously used model resource. 在 prefab 中修改 MeshRenderer 组件的 mesh 时，如果使用的 mesh 是来自开启了 lod 功能的模型资源，那么 prefab 中就会一直引用这个模型资源，即使修改 mesh 使用其他模型资源但是 prefab 中还是会记录使用过的模型资源。 This is the UUID of the model mesh resource currently being used by the prefab. 这是 prefab 正在使用的模型 mesh 资源 uuid However, the prefab still retains the UUIDs of the previously used model mesh resources. ### Relevant error log output - ### Steps to reproduce https://download.cocos.org/CocosTechnicalSupport/VipIssues/XiYun/20240402001.mov ### Minimal reproduction project [demo.zip](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/files/14835100/demo.zip)

title: 相机位置变化时，TiledLayer 的裁剪不对。

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.1

### System information

any

### Issue description

1. tiled-layer 监听CameraNode的NodeEventType.TRANSFORM_CHANGED来触发自己的updateCulling.
2. updateCulling内部使用的 camera.screenToWorld
3. camera.screenToWorld 依赖_matViewProjInv属性。
4. 而正常情况下，camera._matViewProjInv会在每一帧渲染时才更新。
5. 所以在 camera 修改位置后立即调用 updateCulling时计算的裁剪区域是不对的。
  1可以在这个函数里主动调用 camera.update 来更新camera._matViewProjInv
![image](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/15061290/5a46714b-3a56-4951-8d2a-6b567f1a6d3f)

### Relevant error log output

逻辑 bug

逻辑 bug

title: Optimize game asset cache database (cacheManager) save when a lot files in cache.

labels.name: Needs Triage

body:
### Use Case

Use game cache in wechat game. The game project has a lot asset files to cache

### Problem Description

When cached files count has a lot （>2000 or above）,if the cache insert a file, the database will update in 2 seconds.  But the json database (cacheList.json) serializing and writing is very slow , makes the game junk at every write time.

### Proposed Solution

Use a database file format for asset cache instead of json file, not serialize all the data for a update. 
Maybe a sqlite or something else format which is fast for insert and save.

_No response_

Maybe a sqlite or something else format which is fast for insert and save.

body:
### Use Case

current declare is : 
```
export class Tween<T> { ... } 
```

when I define a var , I have to use
```let foo : cc.Tween<OneType>```

but in most cases , the APIs of  cc.Tween (eg. foo.stop()  foo.satrt() foo.timeScale ...)   don't care about the genericity .
and the var `foo` may be used for many different tween  instances, like this
```
// method 1
if (foo) {
 foo.stop()
}
foo = cc.tween<TypeA>(......)

// method 2
if (foo) {
 foo.stop()
}
foo = cc.tween<TypeB>(......)

```

so I hope there could be a default value of T . like this
```
export class Tween<T = any> { ... } 
```

none

### Use Case

spine.skeletonData.getSkinsEnum();
但是返回的是一个 key-value , 而且是双向的 并不便于使用.

我自己在项目里实现了一个这个方法
```
    getAllSpinSkins (spine: sp.Skeleton): string[] {
        const skins = (spine.skeletonData.skeletonJson as any).skins as any[];
        const nameList = skins.map((skin) => skin.name as string);
        return nameList;
    }
```
希望cocos能自带,  这样开发者只要  用 ```spine.getAllSkins()``` 就可以了

title: [extensions] Support defining new recognized file formats - or resource files.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

There is a lot of times when one wishes to create a data-only component [i.e: not really a component]. This data-only component can be serialized/deserialized the same way as the editor does. It also uses the editor for user-friendly modification.





### Problem Description

Workarounds:

1.  Create a prefab with the data-only component, then modify it. After that, copy the component data and paste it on where you're actually using. Problem: Your data can get out of sync and also this process take a lot more time to do.
2. Have a prefab field, push this prefab, instantiate, get component and destroy the prefab. Problem: Lots of indirection and the check will only happen at runtime


### Proposed Solution

Use package.json format for defining new supported formats: For example, 
```json
"contributions": {
        "assets": {
            "formats": {
                ".strip": "A strip format is somewhere you can define the data of type Strip"
            },

```

After that, one would be able to define an editor inspector extension for the .strip format:

```json
"inspector": {
            "section": {
                "asset": {
                    "strip": "./dist/contributions/inspector/strip.js"
                }
            }
        },
```

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

Being able to serialize classes extending `Asset`. 
This idea comes mostly from Unity's scriptable objects and Godot Resource:


Godot: https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/tutorials/scripting/resources.html#creating-your-own-resources

Unity: https://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/class-ScriptableObject.html

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: [2D] [iOS web] Sprite is not rendered with RenderRoot2D and Camera.Far = 1000 (default value)

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.1, 3.8.2

### System information

iOS Safari/Other browsers (17.2.1)

### Issue description

Tested with multiple iOS devices. iOS (17.2.1)

The problem is RenderRoot2D with Camera.Far = 1000 works everywhere except iOS devices.

It seems iOS WebKit fails in test "pos.z > camera.far". It calculates basically "1000 > 1000 === true" on iOS devices, or something like that.

It was a very stange behaviour since rendering worked nicely everywhere except iOS devices. So debugging this one was a total disaster.

I assume it would be nice to change RenderRoot2D applying .z to 999. Or change default Camera.Far to 1001 or something.

WORKAROUND: make Camera.Far greater than 1000.

### Relevant error log output

No errors.

### Steps to reproduce

1) Create 2D game.
2) Add camera. Default Far option is 1000
3) Add sprites on scene.
4) Add RenderRoot2D to some sprites.
5) Launch preview or build on iOS device. See that nodes with RenderRoot2D are not rendered.

### Minimal reproduction project

_No response_

System.import('cc')加载的_virtual_cc.js将近800K(gzip后)我这仅仅是2D游戏，而且已经裁剪了不需要的功能。
这还不算完，运行cc.game.run()后，又加载了将近700K(gzip后)的spine库文件，还有110K(gzip后)的internal文件(我没有用到shader等高级功能)。

在我们的性能统计中，90分位数据：
System.import('cc') 耗时3秒左右
cc.game.run() 耗时5.5秒左右

_No response_

title: BlockInputEvent is bound to the prefab, resulting in child nodes not receiving touch events.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.8.0

### System information

Web

### Issue description

The scenario involves a prefab with the bound "BlockInputEvent" and includes child nodes "scrollView" and "ndTouch." Within the "content" of the scrollView, there are two instances of the "HeroListItem" prefab, which itself contains a "button" node and an "nd_guide" node bound to the "Node.EventType.TOUCH_START" event. Additionally, the "ndTouch" node has also been bound to the "Node.EventType.TOUCH_START" event. Testing reveals that both the "nd_guide" and "Button" touch events are not triggering (no log prints).

"I attempted to modify the dispatchEvent in the node-event-processor.ts, and it seems to resolve the current issue. However, I'm uncertain whether this might lead to other  problems."

title: Remove cannon.js

labels.name: Optimization
labels.description: Enhancement in performance, usability, stability etc

body:
Cocos includes too many 3d physics engine, should just keep as less as possible. connon.js can only work in web, bullet and bullet.wasm can replace it.

Bullet is more powerful than cannon.js, for example, cannon.js doesn't support constrain. So not all physics features can work with all physics engines.

The size of cannon.js is 454kb, bullet.wasm is 478kb. They are more or less the same.
But not all web platforms supports wasm, then these platforms should use bullet.asm.js version.

Of course, we will not remove it at once, but will not fix the bug only exists in it. And change default physic engine to bullet.

title: Evaluate using Profile-Guided Optimization (PGO) and LLVM BOLT

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

Improve overall Cocos Engine CPU performance.

### Problem Description

I am collecting all materials (benchmarks, articles, stories, showcases, etc.) about Profile-Guided Optimization (PGO) across different applications [here](https://github.com/zamazan4ik/awesome-pgo). I am sure you will be able to find helpful information regarding PGO.

Related to the gamedev domains, I suggest you look at the following things:

* I did some benchmarks for Bevy with PGO. PGO-run (first) vs non-PGO (second) - [Pastebin](https://gist.github.com/zamazan4ik/bbffbdf9b10e2a281f5d5373347f48ef). In these results you need to interpret performance decrease as "Release version is slower than PGOed" and performance increase as "Release version is faster than PGOed". As you see, in many scenarios PGO improves performance, but in some of them performance is decreased.
* Unreal Engine supports PGO build since 4.27 ([release notes](https://docs.unrealengine.com/4.27/en-US/WhatsNew/Builds/ReleaseNotes/4_27/)). According to the documentation, PGO allows to achieve better performance on UE too (+10% on some CPU-heavy scenarios from this page). Also, I've talked with developers in a local Telegram chat about UE. A person said that they use PGO as a default optimization with UE and their games. The PGO profiles are collected via crafted local test workloads (usually - the most difficult scenes) with [Gauntlet](https://docs.unrealengine.com/4.27/en-US/TestingAndOptimization/Automation/Gauntlet/). The performance improvement is something like 6-8%
* Godot proposal about PGO - [link](https://github.com/godotengine/godot-proposals/issues/2610)
* Unity Burst thread about PGO - [link](https://forum.unity.com/threads/profile-guided-optimisation-for-burst.931419/)

That's why I think trying to optimize Cocos Engine with PGO would be a good idea.

### Proposed Solution

I can propose the following action points:

* Check the PGO effects on Cocos Engine. If it works well - write a note in the Cocos Engine documentation about building with PGO. 
* Provide an easy way to build Cocos Engine with PGO (e.g. via custom build options in the build scripts), and experienced users will be able to rebuild Cocos Engine with PGO on their own for their own usage scenarios.
* Optimizing prebuilt binaries with PGO would be a nice thing to have (if it's possible to prepare a generic enough workload).

As an additional optimization, I suggest looking at [LLVM BOLT](https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/blob/main/bolt/README.md). But from my experience, starting with PGO and only then using BOLT would be better.

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

Do not perform additional Cocos Engine optimizations.

### Additional Information

More PGO information (benchmarks, integration examples, documentation, etc.) could be found at https://github.com/zamazan4ik/awesome-pgo .

title: Add option to remove SystemJS

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

Consider a scenario where a game built with Cocos contains numerous small modules and assets. The current build process, utilizing SystemJS, results in each module being loaded individually, leading to increased network requests and potential performance bottlenecks. By removing SystemJS and introducing a custom bundling strategy, developers can combine these small modules into a smaller set of files, reducing the number of network requests and improving overall performance. This use case highlights the need for the suggested build option.

### Problem Description

The current Cocos build process relies on SystemJS as the module loader. However, there is a need for an option to remove SystemJS and provide support for custom bundling strategies due to the following reasons:

1. Improved native ESM API compatibility: The native ESM API support has significantly improved, rendering SystemJS less necessary for module loading.
2. Performance optimization: To boost performance, it is desirable to bundle multiple small Cocos artifacts into a smaller number of files. However, the existing build tools lack the capability to resolve the SystemJS syntax required for achieving this optimization.

### Proposed Solution

I propose introducing a new build option that allows users to remove SystemJS and provides support for custom bundling strategies. This would enable developers to optimize their builds by bundling multiple files into a smaller set of files, resulting in improved performance.

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

1. Enhancing existing build tools: One alternative considered was to enhance the existing build tools to incorporate a custom bundling strategy that can handle the SystemJS syntax. However, this approach might introduce increased complexity and maintenance efforts.
3. Writing a Babel plugin: Another alternative considered was to develop a Babel plugin that can transform SystemJS syntax into native ESM syntax. However, it was found that there are currently no readily available open-source tools in the community for this specific transformation.

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: Allow specifying target GLSL version
body:
For regular GLSL, one can use directive `#version 330` specify the targeting GLSL version is 3.3.0. In the other hand, Creator mandate users to provide GLSL 1.0.0 compatible shaders.

This however could be unnecessary if users' targeting platform **DEFINITELY** support higher version GLSL. So could we provide an option, for example, `"minimalGlslVersion: '110' | '330' | '...'"`, as project setting. If one is specified, Creator no longer generate shaders lower than the version.

title: Inconsistency in Handling of Default Function Parameters Between JavaScript and JSB
body:
In JavaScript, it is possible to selectively use default parameter values even if they appear before other parameters in a function declaration. Specifically, JavaScript allows setting an earlier parameter to `undefined` in order to use its default value, while providing explicit values for subsequent parameters. This feature does not have an equivalent in C++.

For example, consider the JavaScript function:

```javascript
function hello(a = "name", b = 3) {}
hello(undefined, 4);
```

In this example, the function `hello` is called with `undefined` for its first argument and `4` for its second argument. The function will execute with `a` getting its default value `"name"` and `b` getting the value `4`.

In contrast, JSB/C++ does not allow this kind of selective defaulting:

```cpp
void hello(int a = 2,  int b = 3) {}
// jsb.hello(undefined, 4);  // This would be invalid in JSB, failed to convert undefined to int
```

In C++, if you want to provide a value for `b`, you have to provide a value for `a` as well.

#### Issue:

This inconsistency may be confusing for developers who work with both languages. Is there a reason behind this design difference? Could C++ adopt JavaScript's more flexible handling of default function parameters?

title: Interaction optimization between requireComponent and disallowMultiple.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

After using any of the above two decorators, it will be very troublesome to do the following two operations:

1. The A component has a disallowMultiple decorator. When replacing the A component with another A subclass component, you need to remove the A component first, and then add another A subclass component.

2. B component is decorated with requireComponent and depends on A component. If you want to remove A component, you need to remove B component before removing A component.

3. Based on the above two premises, when you want to do the first point (replace the existing A component with another A component), the problem is even more serious, you need:

1. Remove B component (because it depends on A) 
2. Remove A component 
3. Add another A component 
4. Add B component 
5. Restore B component just set

If there are more components that depend on the A component, it is almost overwhelming to replace the A component.


### Problem Description

RT.

### Proposed Solution

1. When adding another A component (including subclasses of A), the editor will pop up a prompt to let you choose between the old one and the new one (may also allow a "keep data" tick).

2. When removing a component decorated with requireComponent, a pop-up window will pop up to let you choose whether to remove the dependent component at the same time, instead of directly prohibiting the operation.

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

Or go a step further, make the engine allow the components on the node to be operated like a list (batch operation, support for replacing components, retaining retainable data during operation).

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: Let requireComponent support functions.

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Use Case

Sometimes a component depends on multiple components, or one of multiple components.

For example, there is a component specially used to record configuration, which can be applied to function A component and function B component.



### Problem Description

RT.

### Proposed Solution

Make requireComponent support provide a function with the following signature:

```
requireComponent(fn: (components: Component[]) => boolean);
```

If you depend on multiple components:
```
requireComponent(components=>[A,B].every(v => components.includes(v)));
```

If you depend on one of multiple components:
```
requireComponent(components=>[A,B].some(v => components.includes(v)));
```

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

The above solution may deviate from the meaning of requireComponent and should probably be called add hook something like.

So the another suggestion is can pass in an object:

```
requireComponent({
    type: "one-of-them",
    components: [A, B],
});

requireComponent({
    type: "all-of-them",
    components: [A, B],
});
```

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: Decouple shader

labels.name: Highlight
labels.description: Highlighted features in a milestone

body:
### Use Case

Currently we use uber shader to do rendering.
In uber shader, it contains static global illumination code and skinning animation code，which are fundamentally incompatible.
Current usage will increase uniform/descriptor usage, since these two feature will use different uniforms/textures.
We should break the shader to reduce resource usages.


### Problem Description

number of uniform/descriptor exceeds platform requirement.

### Proposed Solution

Split uber shader into static and animation ones.

### How it works

By breaking uniforms/descriptors into two groups, each group will have fewer uniforms/descriptors.

### Alternatives Considered

Refactor PerInstance descriptor set, but cannot fundamentally solve this problem.

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: MeshCollider bake options
body:
### Use Case

Currently, the mesh collider must use the original data of the assigned mesh. Consequently, if the original mesh is highly complex, it can significantly decrease performance. While it's possible to assign the mesh collider with a simplified mesh, this means users would need to maintain two separate meshes, which increases complexity.

To address this, a bake panel could be introduced for the mesh collider, providing an additional option to configure the mesh collider.

1. Bake panel
    1. Mesh simplify ratio (0-100%)
    2. Mesh optimization
    3. ...

2. Bake process
  The mesh collider component relies on the assigned mesh asset. When the mesh asset is updated, the mesh collider should also be baked to reflect the changes. The baked data is stored in a buffer asset.
    1. Mesh optimization
    2. Mesh simplification

3. Load process
  During component initialization, the buffer asset containing the baked mesh data is acquired.

4. Data storage 
  The data is stored in a buffer asset, supporting two formats:
    1. Converted mesh: Contains only vertex positions.
    3. Indexed mesh: Includes both vertex positions and triangle faces.

5. Bonus
    1. Compression/decompression capabilities.


### Problem Description

None

### Proposed Solution

_No response_

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

None

support implement component lib as plugin script

labels.name: Scripting
labels.description: Engine bindings, script system and editor script compiler related

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
The current contradiction of this task is that the plugin script needs to be executed in the editor, and other platform runtimes.

However, the compilation targets of the engines in different environments are inconsistent, so the same plugin script cannot be used in two different engine runtimes:
- In the editor we use es6
- In the other platform runtimes we use es5 except native platforms.

### currently available solutions
- Provide compile target options for plugin scripts
- Import plugin scripts using npm modules
- Engine unified compilation target (this may reduce runtime performance)

### Cocos Creator version

3.8.0

### System information

test on mac 13.4 chrome

### Issue description

When changing node of skinned model, webgl keep telling there are unbound buffers.

Somehow we noticed:
1. when change hairstyle of a human model, node is updated;
2. skiningRoot setter triggered;
3. tryBindAnimation in skinning root setter binds gfx buffer to descriptor set;
4. update -> ensureEnoughBuffers  in skinning root setter destroy original buffers but without updating descriptor set;
thus error occurred when drawing.

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

Change node of skinned model, like change another hairstyle of a human model.

The triangle mesh of the physx backend will calculate the center of mass, and the triangle mesh of the bullet backend will not 2. The physx backend only uses the first submesh, and the bullet backend will use all submesh It seems that the triangle mesh implementation of the physx backend is more in line with expectations, so it is recommended that the triangle mesh of the bullet backend also be aligned to the physx backend. | | | | ----------------- | --- | | mesh attach point | | | bullet mesh collider | |

title: Add screen size and resolution APIs

labels.name: Env: Native
labels.description: General issue on all native platforms including iOS, Android, MacOS, Windows

body:
### Use Case

Screen size API is important for Desktop apps, and dynamic adjust should be available at runtime.
Passive screen resize now involves back buffer size, all cameras and re-adaptation of UI, but developers could also benefits from active screen resize APIs.

On the other hand, even with constant screen size, developers can also have performance benefit if we allow user to customize its resolution. This is important on mobile devices and web.

### Problem Description

Currently we only have [`root.resize`](https://docs.cocos.com/creator/3.7/api/en/class/Root?id=resize) API, but it's too low level, we need `Screen` level customization which could actively handle all relative changes.

Request received form the forum too:
https://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/feature-request-configure-renderer-resolution/58888

### Proposed Solution

Proposed APIs

- Support `windowSize` for other desktop platforms in [screen](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/blob/v3.7.4/cocos/core/platform/screen.ts#L81)
- Add `resolutionScale` to [screen](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/blob/v3.7.4/cocos/core/platform/screen.ts)

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

Nothing to add

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: TOUCH_MOVE events does not trigger properly at the bottom corners of the screen (on Android devices)
body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.6.3, 3.7.3

### System information

Windows 10 Editor

### Issue description

When buttons are placed at the bottom corners of the screen (like the below image), their animations won't play when running the game on Android device. 

![image](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/82378750/ca004f36-b806-472e-b4bc-7998725aecd1)

Tapping the button on Android does not trigger the button animation. Only if I hold my finger on the button for 1 second the animation will play. This is not an issue when buttons are not placed very close to the bottom corners of the screen.

After some digging in the source code it seems like that for some reason the "TOUCH_MOVE" event does not trigger properly in the bottom corners of the screen.

I suspect that this bug is introduced by #12243 but I haven't tested earlier versions of the engine to be sure.

### Relevant error log output

_No response_

### Steps to reproduce

- Create a new empty project
- Put a new button at the bottom corner of the screen (either left or right). 
- Run the game on an Android device and tap the buttons to see if they're animations are working.

The Spring Joint joins two rigidbody together but allows the distance between them to change as though they were connected by a spring.

### Problem Description

The spring acts like a piece of elastic that tries to pull the two anchor points together to the exact same position.

title: 添加通过 gizmo 可视化方式配置 constraint 的支持。

labels.name: P1
labels.description: Must be finished in the milestone

labels.name: Editor
labels.description: Editor related

labels.name: Module: Scene
labels.description: Scene editor

body:
### Use Case

物理约束的 gizmo 需求

![image](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/24495793/22138129-16e6-4488-8a3b-c96e05e91b4f)

在物理引擎中，用户需要配置很多约束，这些约束体相对于依附刚体的位置和朝向需要手动设置，这使得配置变得不太直观，难以一次性正确设置。使用 gizmo（交互式工具）可以更加友好地进行约束配置。目前，Unity和Unreal都支持使用gizmo进行约束配置。


### Problem Description

以下是具体建议：
1. 约束体的位置	
可以使用一个小球来显示joint的空间位置，并搭配一个或多个坐标轴来表示joint相对于attached body的朝向。用户可以通过拖动这个球在空间中平移来设置位置，并通过拖动转轴来设置朝向。此外，还可以绘制两条连线，将joint和两个连接的物体的质心连接起来。如果connected body没有设置（即连接到物理世界），则可以跳过这条连线。
![image](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/24495793/78d7572f-0329-4aec-802e-b2960484e2db)
![image](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/24495793/9ea67433-503a-4866-89e4-cfd014f1cd72)

2.  约束的范围限制
	一些约束会限制被约束物体在约束体空间内的运动范围，包括线性范围和角度范围。线性范围可以由用户自行配置，而角度范围则可以使用gizmo进行调节。
![image](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/assets/24495793/f42180fe-beab-4a3f-9aca-92d396108d1e)

3. 操作逻辑
	可以在约束面板上添加“edit constraint”按钮。当用户点击该按钮时，预览界面将关闭常规物体的gizmo，仅显示约束gizmo。当用户选中其他物体时，界面会自动恢复原模式。通过解析gizmo的信息，物理约束可以获取相关配置信息。



### Proposed Solution

_No response_

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

None

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: The texture of button is set to normal state if moving inside button area after pressing.

labels.name: Module: 2D
labels.description: 2D rendering and UI

body:
## How to reproduce?
- Create a button in scene
- Run the scene
- Press the button and don't release (don't fire up/release event)
- Move inside the button's area
- Result: The texture of button is set to normal state, but currently the button is still in pressed state.

## Expect Result:

- The texture of button should keep in the `pressed` state if up event is not fired.
- The texture of button be in `normal` state if moving outside of button area.

title: GFX Pipeline Cache Support
body:
### Use Case

When compiling shaders, use the binary compilation results from the previous launch.

### Problem Description

The creation and compilation process of Shader and PSO may have significant overhead, and using binary caching can speed up this process.

### Proposed Solution

The compilation results of Shader and PSO can be obtained and reused from the driver to accelerate the next compilation process.

The implementations of each backend are as follows：
* GLES2: shader binary
* GLES3: program binary
* VK: VkPipelineCache
* Metal: MTLBinaryArchive

### How it works

_No response_

### Alternatives Considered

none

### Additional Information

_No response_

title: New ParticleSystem RoadMap
body:
## 1.0
### Key Features
* All particle modules are pluggable
* All particle data are pluggable
* Event Generator And Event Receiver (Known as SubEmitter)
* Multiply Renderer (One particle system can includes multiple renderer)
* Particle Expression
* Emitter cascade operation(set LifeCycle, play, stop, pause etc)

### Emitter
* Duration
* LoopMode(includes Once, Multiply, Infinite)
* DelayMode(includes None, FirstLoop, EveryLoop)
* Prewarm
* SimulationSpace (includes World, Local)
* SimulationSpeed
* maxDeltaTime
* CapacityMode (How to react when particle number increased. includes Auto, Fixed)
* PlayOnAwake
* useAutoRandSeed(Using a fixed seed or random seed)
* BoundsMode(How to calculate emitter bounds, includes Auto, Fixed)
* CullingMode(How to react when emitter being culled by frustum culling. includes Always Simulate, Pause, PauseAndCatchUp, StopEmitting, ClearAndFinish)
* FinishAction(How to react when all particles died and emitter is inactive. includes None, Destroy, Disable)

### Experession
#### Float Expression
* Local Value (like legacy curve range's Constant Mode)
* Float From Curve (like legacy curve range's Curve mode)
* Random Ranged(combine Random Ranged and Constant will produce TwoConstant effect, combine Random Ranged and Float From Curve will produce TwoCurves effect)

#### Vec3 Expression
* 3 Float

#### Color Expression
* Local Value (like legacy gradient range's Color Mode)
* Color from Gradient (like legacy gradient range's Gradient Mode)
* RandomRanged (Combin RandomRanged and Color will produce TwoColor Mode, Combine RandomRanged and Gradient will produce TwoGradient Mode)
* RandomColorFromGrandient (like legacy gradient range's Random Mode)

### Emitter Update
* SpawnRate Module(Legacy named EmitOverTime)
* Burst Module
* SpawnPerUnit Module(Legacy named EmitOverDistance)

### Particle Spawn
* BoxShape Module
* CircleShape Module
* ConeShape Module
* Donut Shape Module
* Grid Shape Module
* Line Shape Module
* HemisphereShape Module
* Rectangle Shape Module
* SphereShape Module

### Particle Update
* Death event generator Module (Generate a death event when particle died)
* Location Event Generator Module (Generate a location event perframe per particle)
* Drag Module (Add a drag according to particle's velocity)
* Inherit Velocity Module (Inherit Emitter's Velocity)
* Solve Module(Solve Force And Velocity)
* State Module (Update Particle's Age, and kill particle when its lifetime elapsed if you want.)
* SubUVAnimation Module(Legacy named Texture Animation Module)
* Rotation Module
* Curl Noise Module (Curl Noise with quality, remap options)
* Limit Velocity Module
* Gravity Module
* Force Module

### Common(Support using in both Particle Spawn and Particle Update)
* AddSpeedInInitialDirection Module (Add speed in particle's initial direction)
* AddVelocity Module
* SetLifeTime Module
* SetColor Module
* SetRotation Module
* SetSize Module
* Multiply Size Module
* Multiply Color Module
* Multiply Color by Speed Module
* Scale Size by Speed Module
* Scale Speed Module
* Sprite Face And Alignment

### Renderer
* Ribbon Renderer Module (Connect particle's position to generate a ribbon)
* Sprite Renderer Module
* Mesh Renderer Module

## 1.1
### Key Features
* Support using in UI
* Custom Parameters (includes UserParameters, EmitterParameters, ParticleParameters)
* Renderer support binding Parameter(For example. Bind Custom Particle Parameter to Renderer.Position)

### Expression
* Binding Parameter (Bind Particle Paramters, Emitter Parameters, UserParameters as expression input)

#### Float Expression
* From Int
* Decompose From Vec3
* Normalized
* Add
* Sub
* Multiply
* Devide
* Sin
* Cos
* Operation If (take a bool expression as condition and do a operation when condition is true)

#### Vec3 Expression
* Normalized
* Make Vec3 from one float
* Add
* Sub
* Multiply
* Devide
* Sin
* Cos
* Operation If (take a bool expression as condition and do a operation when condition is true)

#### Bool Expression
* From Int

#### Int Expression
* From Float

#### Color Expression
* From RGB And Alpha

### Particle Spawn
* Mesh Shape Module
* Skinned Mesh Renderer Shape Module
* Spline Shape(Bezier Curve Based) Module

### Particle Update
* Vortex Velocity Module
* Point Attraction Force Module
* Collision Module
* ForceField Module
* Wind Force Module
* Trigger Module

### Common (Can used in both Particle Spawn and Particle Update)
* Set Parameter Module(Set Any Parameter with Expression)

### Renderer
* Light Renderer Module(Using particle's position to generate light)

## 1.2 
* Compute Shader Based Simulation
* C++ fullly implement,

### Particle Spawn
* Sample Texture (Set Particle's Color from Sampling Texture)
* Kill Particles When Alpha Less Than (Kill Particle according to particle's color alpha chanel)

title: FSR2 方案
body:
# FSR 2

https://gpuopen.com/gdc-presentations/2023/GDC-2023-Temporal-Upscaling.pdf

FSR 2 实现限制：
- 需要支持 motion vector
- 只支持 vulkan 和 dx12 后端
- 网上没有 glsl 现成可直接用的代码，相比 fsr 1 有代码可以直接 copy 过来用

其他引擎实现情况
unity (未完成): https://forum.unity.com/threads/boost-your-fps-with-amd-fidelityfx-super-resolution-2-0-fsr-2-support.1357190/
godot  (未完成): https://github.com/godotengine/godot-proposals/issues/4280
unreal（AMD 实现）: https://gpuopen.com/learn/ue-fsr2/

title: Disabling loose mode greatly affects performance on Web Mobile platform

labels.name: Scripting
labels.description: Engine bindings, script system and editor script compiler related

labels.name: Needs Triage
labels.description: Needs to be assigned by the team

body:
### Cocos Creator version

3.6.3, 3.7.1

### System information

Android 10 on OnePlus 5, Vivo v11, Xiaomi Redmi Note 8 Pro, iOS 16.3.1 on iphone 11

### Issue description

Disabling loose mode greatly affects performance on Web Mobile platform on mobile devices (Android, iOS).

The bug seems to appear only on mobile devices and doesn't affect desktop browsers (or I didn't notice it).

Below is the screenshots of test project run on Chrome on OnePlus 5 phone. The first one was build with loose mode __on__. The second one with loose mode __off__ (the strict mode).

As you can see, renderer time was increased from 5ms to 23ms and FPS drops from 60 to 41 (or even worse).

Run with loose mode on:

![LooseModeOn](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/167248/227280258-68f470cb-e6e7-4353-80e5-b8a645063b2b.jpg)

Run with loose mode off:

![LooseModeOff](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/167248/227280236-91b0aede-bb26-41c3-8204-7748adc23179.jpg)

The loose mode checkbox:

![Screenshot 2023-03-23 170859](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/167248/227282151-c4d28d72-6ae2-48bf-b7a3-a702671eba1e.png)


### Relevant error log output

No errors were found

### Steps to reproduce

1. Unpack and open attached test project
2. Open Project Settings / Scripting and check or uncheck "Enable loose mode" checkbox
3. Build project for Web Mobile platform
4. Run the build on mobile device


### Minimal reproduction project

[testcocosbug.zip](https://github.com/cocos/cocos-engine/files/11053776/testcocosbug.zip)

The test project is a grid of sprites mixed with text to make some load for the browser. There are no something special inside.

### Cocos Creator version

3.7.1

Windows 10

從名稱上判別
Node.getComponents 應該支援一般類建構子，與抽象類建構子

藉此讓 getComponents 能使用抽象類作為搜索參數?
